actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-944.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 197 - 194 (Record Vote No: 414).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6211) to authorize appropriations for construction of certain highways in accordance with title 23, United States Code, for highway safety, for mass transportation in urban and rural areas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6211 (Highway and mass transporation appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6211) to authorize appropriations for construction of certain highways in accordance with title 23, United States Code, for highway safety, for mass transportation in urban and rural areas, and for other purposes.
